title: KARUNANIDHI SAYS HE DOUBTS RAJAPAKSA STATEMENT ON NORTHERN POLLS IN JAFFNA
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana DMK leader Muthuvel Karunanidhi said that he very much doubts about President Rajapaksa’s statement on the Northern Provincial Council elections saying there is some “hidden meaning” on the polls scheduled a year from now as was said by the President….
